TextLibrary.Text: Time to take your ship for a spin. Fly out to the planet Erebus II - it's the one on your HUD with the flashing yellow square. Then, when you have mastered the controls, fly back to the station.
Time to take your ship for a spin. Fly out to the planet Erebus II - it's the one on your HUD with the flashing yellow square. Then, when you have mastered the controls, fly back to the station.
